thread.title: 45th annual Pride Parade draws thousands to Atlanta
thread.title_full: 45th annual Pride Parade draws thousands to Atlanta

title: 45th annual Pride Parade draws thousands to Atlanta
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest 45th annual Pride Parade draws thousands to Atlanta The 45th annual Atlanta Pride Parade was held in downtown Atlanta on Sunday, drawing crowds from around the United States. Post to Facebook 45th annual Pride Parade draws thousands to Atlanta The 45th annual Atlanta Pride Parade was held in downtown Atlanta on Sunday, drawing crowds from around the United States. Check out this story on 11alive.com: http://on.11alive.com/1LpXNX8 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs 45th annual Pride Parade draws thousands to Atlanta 45th Pride Parade draws massive crowd 11Alive Staff, WXIA 8:59 p.m. EDT October 11, 2015 Photos from Atlanta Pride Parade 2015. (Photo: Michael Lee/WXIA) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ATLANTA -- The 45th annual Atlanta Pride Parade was held in downtown Atlanta on Sunday, drawing crowds from around the United States. 
The parade made its way from the civic center MARTA station before heading down Peachtree and finally ending at Piedmont Park. 
The event, which has drawn more than 200,000 people in the past brought out big crowds once again, Sunday. 
RELATED: See more Pride related content here. 
This year’s parade also held a special significance for many since the Supreme Court’s decision legalizing same-sex marriage. 
Taking full advantage of their new rights were some who proposed to their significant – a couple even in the parade itself. 
Several businesses and local officials also got involved with the parade and groups like the Atlanta Hawks had a presence as well.
